Vision
We are committed to providing permanent, dedicated 
capital to the U.S. housing market with a long-term 
investment perspective incorporating sustainability 
factors to generate favorable risk-adjusted 
returns with a substantial yield component to our 
stockholders.
Our corporate responsibilities extend far beyond our 
core vision of providing capital to support the U.S. 
housing market and generating attractive returns for 
our stockholders. We consider the interests of all our 
stakeholders — our stockholders, employees, funding 
and trading counterparties, vendors, and community 
— in pursuing the long-term success of our business.Values
